data.text: A Yave, Nzambi wumvutulanga landi.
Telama kuaku ngeyo zuzi di ntoto ;
Nate thangu mbi batu bambimbi, a Yave ?
Bawu balembo muangisa mambu ma luniemo.
Bawu balembo diatidila batu baku, a Yave,
Balembo vondi difuola ayi nkebi ;
Balembo tubi : “Yave kakadi mona
Lukeba beno bakambulu diela luidi va khatitsika batu !
Niandi wutula dikutu kalendi wa ko e ?
Niandi weti vana makanda thumbudulu makanda
Yave zebi mayindu ma mutu ;
Lusakumunu kuidi mutu wowo weti vana thumbudulu, a Yave,
Weti kumvana lusadusu mu bilumbu bi phasi
Bila Yave kalendi yekula batu bandi ko
Tsambusu yela buela ba diaka yisonga
Nani wela kuthelumina va ntuala batu bambimbi e ?
Enati Yave kasia kuphana lusadusu ko
Mu thangu ndituba ; “kulu kuama kueka sialumuka” ;
Mu thangu mayindu maba mawombo mu minu ;
Kundu ki luyalu ki batu bamvanganga mambimbi
Bankutakananga mu nuanisa batu basonga
Vayi Yave wuyika suamunu kiama kingolo ;
Wela kuba vutudila mu diambu di masumu mawu,
